Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2012 04:59AM curlywhitedog wrote: Hi AussieKate: I'll be starting radiation later this month, have my mapping session scheduled for the 18th.  Some say no side effects to speak of, others say lots of tiredness but I'm optimistic I'll fall in the former category and not the latter.  I'm much more concerned about the side effects of the hormonal treatment but should know more about that later this afternoon when I meet with my medical oncologist to discuss my situation and get his recommendation.    Happy to meet you and the others who are sharing this journey.  Maria
Posts.Title: January 2012 rads Kate60 edoyrest
